description: The dashboard is designed for KubeDB managed Redis

panels.description: Total node count of Redis cluster
panels.title: Total Nodes

panels.description: Initial Requested CPU amount by Postgres Instance
panels.title: CPU Request (Core)

panels.title: CPU Limit (Core)

panels.title: Memory Request

panels.title: Storage Request

targets.expr: sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}))) by (pod)

sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}))) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left () max by (namespace,pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}))) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"}))) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left () max by (namespace,pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",job="kubelet",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$",container!=""} * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!=""}))) by (pod)

sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace, pod, cluster) group_left () max by (namespace, pod, cluster) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$",container!="", image!=""}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace, pod, cluster) group_left () max by (namespace, pod, cluster) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$app-\\d+$|$app-shard\\d+-\\d+$"} * on (namespace, pod, cluster) group_left () max by (namespace, pod, cluster) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)
